document_data.mainbody: '''Gluttony domain''' was a suite of [[spell]]s that were granted by [[deities]] whose portfolios concerned the selfish desire for pleasure, experiences, and indulging every appetite.{{Cite dragon/323/Seven Deadly Domains|63}}
document_data.Spells:
During the latter part of the [[Era of Upheaval]], [[priests]] who chose this domain had access to the following spells as they grew stronger.

Novice spellcasters were able to use the ''[[goodberry]]'', ''[[death knell]]'', and ''[[create food and water]]'' spells. Clerics of some experience could cast ''[[vampiric touch]]'', ''[[baleful polymorph]]'', and ''[[heroes' feast]]''. Those that were masters in this domain had access to ''[[stone to flesh]]'', ''[[bite of the king]]'' or [[Swallow (spell)|''swallow'']], and ''[[trap the soul]]''.
document_data.Other powers: In addition, [[cleric]]s of the Gluttony domain gained the ability to receive the effects of the ''[[enlarge person]]'' spell.
